ISSUE.TITLE: [gogs] Incorrect resolution of relative "avatar_url"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Drone is showing all broken images as avatars for repositories from Gogs source. I've seen it's due to relative URLs being found in "avatar_url" element of the `api/v1/orgs/orgname` endpoint, for example: `"avatar_url":"/gogs/avatars/6"` Drone is turning that into an url relative to the Drone url, not the Gogs url.
